overview_of_class: Systems of linear ordinary differential equations, qualitative analysis of ordinary differential equations, linear  partial differential equations, Laplace transform, Fourier series, orthogonal functions, and applications. Prerequisites: 290-1,2,3 or 291-1,2,3, and 360-1.
name: MENU: Applied Analysis
title: WCAS MATH 360-2-71 MENU: Applied Analysis

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Systems of linear ordinary differential equations, qualitative analysis of ordinary differential equations, linear partial differential equations, Laplace transform, Fourier series, orthogonal functions, and applications. Prerequisites: 290-1,2,3 or 291-1,2,3, and 360-1.

descriptions.name: Learning Objectives
descriptions.value: Knowledge and use of differentials equations used in a variety of contexts.
